snippet: Virginia’s former secretary of the commonwealth, Janet Vestal Kelly, detailed the strains that “ruined” her relationship with Maureen McDonnell, the wife of former Gov. Bob McDonnell.
abstract: Defense testimony begins in corruption trial of former Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell and his wife Maureen McDonnell; leans heavily on Virginia’s former secretary of commonwealth Janet Vestal Kelly to detail Maureen's relationship with her husband, her staff and Jonnie R Williams Sr, chief executive of dietary supplement maker Star Scientific; couple faces up to 20 years in prison if convicted.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and KEN MAGUIRE

lead_paragraph: Virginia’s former secretary of the commonwealth, Janet Vestal Kelly, detailed the strains that “ruined” her relationship with Maureen McDonnell, the wife of former Gov. Bob McDonnell.

headline.main: Aide Describes Staff Revolt Against Former Virginia Governor’s Wife
headline.print_headline: Aide Describes Staff Revolt Against Ex-Governor’s Wife
